neatDraw

Class DrawablePopulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • neatCore.Population
      • neatDraw.DrawablePopulation

  • public abstract class DrawablePopulation
extends neatCore.Population
    This class is meant to handle all of the GUI stuff for you

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        protected void setUp()
        Description copied from class: neatCore.Population
        This function is optional. It's called on the first line of run(), and intended to set up the display, any data collection things, etc.
        Specified by:
        setUp in class neatCore.Population

      • captureData

        protected void captureData()
        Description copied from class: neatCore.Population
        Collects data of the current generation after all fitnesses have been evaluated. If you have any graphs, this is where you should update their data.
        Specified by:
        captureData in class neatCore.Population

      • drawPopulation

        protected void drawPopulation()
        Description copied from class: neatCore.Population
        This function is optional. If you have a display for this population's genomes, draw that display in this function.
        Specified by:
        drawPopulation in class neatCore.Population

      • isPaused

        protected boolean isPaused()
        Description copied from class: neatCore.Population
        Allows pausing of the simulation.
        Specified by:
        isPaused in class neatCore.Population

      • evaluateFitnesses

        protected abstract void evaluateFitnesses()
        Description copied from class: neatCore.Population
        Sets the fitness values of every genome in the population. This function includes any simulation that your application of NEAT requires
        Specified by:
        evaluateFitnesses in class neatCore.Population

      • getTargetFitness

        protected abstract float getTargetFitness()
        Description copied from class: neatCore.Population
        Mandatory implementation: return the target fitness for this algorithm. once this fitness is reached or passed, the algorithm ends.
        Specified by:
        getTargetFitness in class neatCore.Population

      • finished

        protected abstract void finished()
        Description copied from class: neatCore.Population
        This function is optional. It's called once any member of the generation reaches the target fitness. By the time this function is called, the algorithm is over and will no longer process new generations.
        Specified by:
        finished in class neatCore.Population

        protected abstract java.lang.String getTitle()
